Articles.Content:
I get a diamond pickaxe and mine all the sandstone I need.

My stack of sandstone.

There was sand above the last block.

Unknown miner's stack of sandstone.

Rebuilds the hill and reinforce it with diamondoid.

My glorious diamondoid hill.

Destroys diamondiod coating with a lonsdaleite drill bit the size of a tractor.

My unprotected hill.

Hill blocks get possessed by administration of the game server and marked as "undestroyable".

Administration's Hill

Server crashes, I restore from backup and place claim on hill prior to going back online.

 

My hill.

I've lived there continuously for 21 years even though I didn't have permission, built my own house, and I ain't sharing.

 

My adverse possession hill.

I allow you to live but i take over the hill and pass a lawthat anyone must pay homage to me (you dont)

my monarchy hill

My's syblings Ny and Xy (μ,ν,ξ) overthrow the My's monarchy and proclaim a triumvirate [obsolete chauvinistic term] triumpersonate.

ΜΝΞ Triumpersonate Hill.

Edited January 14, 2018 by kerbiloid

I restart the game

's hill.

I yell, "Screw all these other people, I say! I'm making my own hill Today!" Then Kraken travelled to the arctic, using several dam -busting nuclear missiles arranged in formation to push up soil and ice to make a new hill. "I have created my very own hill!", he said. "Now as a guard I hire my friend bill! He has a watchtower in a little machine gun armed mill!"

My slightly irradiated, guarded by bill, hill.

Ya gotta admit, that was pretty clever.
I take Death Star and takeover the entire universe!

12 hours ago, dundun93 said:

I take Death Star and takeover the entire universe!

No. I send Bill in an X- Wing, using hyper- unrealistic physics to drop a small missile into a two meter across port, destroying the death star. My Machine Gun Bill Hill.

ERMAGHERSH AUTOCORRECT...

Edited February 4, 2018 by TheMadKraken2297

I destroy the gun and throw Bill off.

Mine HieLl

I build a space center on a hill next to the other hill. It has an absurd amount of heavily armed SSTOVTOLspacefighters that rely on realistic physics. 

@TheKSPBeginner‘s hill and my space center hill.

8 hours ago, 53miner53 said:

SSTOVTOLspacefighters that rely on realistic physics. 

@TheKSPBeginner

Due to realistic physics, your fighters, being cylindrical nuke-armed, wingless rockets, try to attack my Hill, but instead go into orbit. I take the hill without resistance, and station large fast firing howitzers and bofors 40mm AA cannons around the space center hill, then proceed to buy a bunch of F/A- 18/E's to protect it. My Hill.

15 hours ago, TheMadKraken2297 said:

Due to realistic physics, your fighters, being cylindrical nuke-armed, wingless rockets, try to attack my Hill, but instead go into orbit. I take the hill without resistance, and station large fast firing howitzers and bofors 40mm AA cannons around the space center hill, then proceed to buy a bunch of F/A- 18/E's to protect it. My Hill.

My fighters come back and nuke your hill and everything on it. 

My massively irradiated hill.

Fighters? You forgot my defense hornets, which countered your fighters while you were still ~600 miles away. Mine. Still. (Sense space fighters weren't designed for re entry, trying to re enter with one is akin to throwing a car from orbit. It's a metal box with fragile radiators. It would have been damaged on launch and on re entry. You should've built em in orbit.)

I upgrade my Hill. I now have those quad stacked AA cannons you sell in WWII movies, shooting down BF-109s. And my hornets are now utahraptors.

And anti- ICBM's.

Edited February 7, 2018 by TheMadKraken2297

I revive this.

Creator's hill.

The revived hill rebels against its creator.

Self-made hill.

I plant a flag on the hill.

My hill.
Everyone's sitting here, capturing hills, while I'm sitting here in my heavily fortified bunker dug into my Hill.
The hill slope slides. Now you can keep sitting in your bunker eternally.
I put more dirt on it. Since it's my dream bunker I can survive indefinitely through hydroponics. And it has a 50 GB/s Interweb speeds!

I simply cut your network feed. You go insane watching the same episode of "The Bachelor" over and over and run out of your bunker.

I push you off the hill on your way out, MY HILL now!
